fields.description: Once this document's status is updated to the specified status, this document will be submitted and no changes can be made to it.
fields.label: Automatically submit document

fields.description: Once this Document Status is reached for a Head Office Order the unit will be moved to the In Transit Warehouse of Head Office.
fields.label: In Transit Warehouse

fields.description: Once this document's status is updated to the specified status, the Vehicle will be automatically transferred to the dealer.
fields.label: Automatically move Vehicle to Dealer

fields.description: If this option is selected, the system will automatically set this status as the default when processing a sale.
fields.label: Default

fields.description: When selected FIFO ruling will apply to Head Office Orders of this Status.
fields.label: Automatically Apply FIFO rule on Vehicles Orders

fields.description: Creates integration file for order when status is reached.
fields.label: Create Integration File
